HEADING: RSS Feed
DESCRIPTION: Subscribe to your comments using RSS. Enable the feed below to get a secure link that includes your top comments from the last 30 days.
SECURITY_WARNING: Security Notice: Anyone with this link will be able to access your comments. Keep this URL private and only share it with trusted RSS readers or services.
FEED_INFO: This RSS feed contains up to 10,000 of your top comments from the last 30 days, sorted by votes and date. You can use this URL in any RSS reader application.
